sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rn, t.* from ( select id, backendtype, backendname, host, sparehost, port, priority, basedn, filter, pubkey, timeout, retrycnt, usernamerule, delimiter, enabled, policy, domainid FROM otppms_backend WHERE 1=1
order by id DESC) t where rownum < = #endRow#) tt where rn > #startRow# order by id DESC
